TEXT.TITLE: ROBERT BRUCE <BRUC> DOWNGRADED BY S/P
TEXT.BODY: Standard and Poor's said it lowered Robert Bruce Industries Inc's 15 mln dlrs of subordinated debentures to CCC from B-minus because of a deterioration in earnings and cash flow. Debt leverage has risen to 87 pct and the company has suspended dividend payments to conserve cash, S and P noted. Reuter
